publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-325 Mr Frank McAveety: The Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc) Order 1999—That the Local Government Committee in consideration of The Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc) Order 1999 recommends that the Order be approved.

S1M-325 Mr Frank McAveety: The Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc) Order 1999—That the Local Government Committee in consideration of The Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc) Order 1999 recommends that the Order be approved.

S1M-325 Mr Frank McAveety: The Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) (No.2) Order 1999—That the Parliament Local Government Committee in consideration of The Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) (No.2) Order 1999 recommends that the Order be approved.
